archimate:BusinessObject.name: ManagedTransmissionEntity
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: This is an abstract base class for describing different types of logical entities that are or help to form connections that transmit and/or receive information. This represents a superclass to various ITU specs (e.g., G.805 and M.3100) as well as IETF concepts (such as those found in various RFCs) so that it can unite ITU and IETF concepts.
